experience.title: Business Mentor-Strategic Advisor to CEO
experience.description: Spaceonova is the leading space education & research startup in India."If God made you capable of helping someone, it's your duty to do so"My Mom taught me this at an early age. Then, at 18, when I was trying to get into Startups, I met the most accepting mentors. Everyone in ecosystem was very kind to me.As a beginner, I used to think that I need mentors from the specific domain Iâ€™m working in. Or to be experts in skills Iâ€™m seeking to learn. Well, not absolutely correct. So far, Iâ€™ve had mentors from different sectors. Academia, Banking, financial services, Chemical Technology and processing.Iâ€™ve learnt a lot from them. I look up to them whenever Iâ€™m stuck somewhere. Irrespective of the size or type of challenge. I personally feel that working closely with mentors catalysed my growth as an entrepreneur and a person as well.Now, I see, life coming full circle. Maybe, too early but thatâ€™s how my career had been so far, haha.Iâ€™m super excited to work with @shivam & team to brainstorm & solve business challenges for Spacenova. Itâ€™s always a pleasure to be working with him. I get to learn so much from him about Space Tech & entrepreneurship in general.Letâ€™s create a Space Ecosystem where limit tends to infinity!

experience.title: Entrepreneur Lead at GDC
experience.description: Glad to share that we've been selected for the prestigious I-NCUBATE program at GDC IIT Madras. Team Serri is one of the 9 teams selected for the 13th Cohort from applications from all over the country.A wonderful journey!Key Highlights:1. More than 50 interviews with customers, users, direct & indirect Competitors. 2. Conducting research around the insights3. Found new customer subsegments4. Identified early adoptersExcited!!!

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneur's Network
positions.description: I'm achieving a reach of 2.5k per post organically on average. This is fairly high as we have around 280 followers only. As compared to Facebook Ads, Facebook Ads on our page have a reach of just around few hundreds for $30. I'm proud to claim a 15 times more reach with our highest  reach which had a reach of 4.6k.I am a part of this Wonderful community Venture since very beginning as a freelancer. I am gaining a fair experience for establishing similar ventures.Working closely with David over community Marketing, I am currently working on the Facebook project. My responsibilities included establishing a Facebook page and manage it. I sincerely thank David to allow me Independence and authority to manage it on my own.
positions.title: Marketing Analyst-Community Growth
positions.description_html:
I'm achieving a reach of 2.5k per post organically on average. This is fairly high as we have around 280 followers only.
As compared to Facebook Ads, Facebook Ads on our page have a reach of just around few hundreds for $30. I'm proud to claim a 15 times more reach with our highest reach which had a reach of 4.6k.

I am a part of this Wonderful community Venture since very beginning as a freelancer. I am gaining a fair experience for establishing similar ventures.

Working closely with David over community Marketing, I am currently working on the Facebook project. My responsibilities included establishing a Facebook page and manage it. I sincerely thank David to allow me Independence and authority to manage it on my own.

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneur's Network
positions.description: I'm being promoted to 'Product Manager- Community' at Entrepreneur's Network. However, I will continue my work in Social Media Marketing.My Roles and Responsibilities include:1) organize the Webinars for the community 2) Communication with speakers, participants, and clients about upcoming programs for the community.Â 3) Program managing will also include adding relevant content on our website about the community events.4) It also includes co-developing future programs with Founder and Managing Principal, Mr. David Wastaffe, and helping to manage those details.6) Managing Social Media handles and Content Marketing as I did before.
positions.title: Product Manager - Community Engagement
positions.description_html:
I'm being promoted to 'Product Manager- Community' at Entrepreneur's Network. However, I will continue my work in Social Media Marketing.
My Roles and Responsibilities include:
1) organize the Webinars for the community

2) Communication with speakers, participants, and clients about upcoming programs for the community.
 
3) Program managing will also include adding relevant content on our website about the community events.

4) It also includes co-developing future programs with Founder and Managing Principal, Mr. David Wastaffe, and helping to manage those details.

6) Managing Social Media handles and Content Marketing as I did before.

experience.title: Community & Marketing Lead
experience.description: I initiated a new concept called SIPWay School a community lead learning platform where we taught people personal finance. In just 1 month, we grew to 5 batches teaching 500+ students with Zero budget.Our Assets under management grew 2X to 2 Crores in just 3 months. I looked after day-to-day operations including but not limited to1. Building community of personal finance enthusiasts2. Rebranded SIPWay as a friendly, innovative & trustworthy company3. Recruited 5 interns from India's leading Institutes like IIT B, JMI Delhi, ICT Mumbai, etc.4. Curated Content for SIPWay School community5. Co-designed curriculum6. Grew the SIPWay School community through various channels in zero to negligible budget.5. Co-designing videos & other visuals for Ads & curriculum6. Partnered up with various other Startups & organisations to further accelerate the community growth & engagement

education.title: Institute Of Chemical Technology
education.description: Activities and Societies: I learn and enjoy being responsible for following: 1. Event Head at Pitchers 2. PR Head of E-cell, ICT 3. Event Head of The Entrepreneur's Blueprint 4. Sponsorships Coordinator for VORTEX, Asia's largest Chemfest. 5. Sponsorships Volunteer for Sports Saga. I'm focusing on practical knowledge and experiences more than grades (doesn't mean compromising grades). I'm loving the exposure this place is providing me. Improving myself everyday. I'm participating in almost every Entrepreneurial Event and Management Fests. Peers here helped me get exposure to secrets of Investing, trading, business and Entrepreneurship. I'm surely going to be a Tech Entrepreneur.

honors_and_awards.title: Eureka Winner- Asia's Biggest Startup Competition
honors_and_awards.description: We won EUREKA! Asia's largest business model competition organised by IIT Bombay. More than 15,000 startups competed for this 25th edition of Eureka, the flagship event of E-summit, by IIT B. Thanks to efforts by incredibly driven team Serri, our mentors' support & all of your best wishes- Serri is the Eureka winner! Coming from Haldwani, winning Asia's largest business model competition feels surreal. Trying to believe it has happened as I type. Thanks everyone forâ€¦ Show more

honors_and_awards.title: Top 20 Global Tech Competition
honors_and_awards.description: Headed by Steve Wozniak, Apple Co-founder, Future labs organised a Global Tech Competition for battling COVID-19 challenges. I lead our team to top 20 among 300 entries globally from MIT, Harvard, Michigan, Oxford, Cambridge, etc. Every year Prospect 100 publishes a list of the 100 best youth talents Aged 21 & Under in the World for Tech, Engineering & Design. Proudly, I'm one of those this year for Serri Tech Solutions.

honors_and_awards.title: Jr. IDP Winner
honors_and_awards.description: Our team won Jr. IDP, one of the flagship Events of VORTEX-7.O, Asia's Largest Chemfest. The event was about Case Studies regarding Challenges faced by Industries We won the 1st Prize, presented publicly by Mr. D.J. Sanghvi, Managing Director, Aarvi Encon Industries pvt ltd.

honors_and_awards.title: Rising Talent by UpWork
honors_and_awards.description: I have been honoured as Rising Talent by Upwork Inc. I'm most probably the youngest one to achieve this. This badge signifies that I, as a freelancer has already demonstrated strong performance in a shorter duration of time.

honors_and_awards.title: LIC-Student of the Year
honors_and_awards.description: I was awarded with the ' LIC-Student of the Year' award for my all-round excellent performance in the year 2015-16. I've been receiving similar intra school awards since 5th Std. In a row. Without a miss.
